text: Marc Michetz pseudonym of Marc Degroide (15 October 1951 â€“ 9 January 2025) was a Belgian comics artist. ==Biography== Michetz was one the original members of (Mazda Gang). He started his career at Studio Graton and then drew for magazines Tintin and Spirou. Michetz was passionate about the Japanese Middle Ages. His best-known creation is the Kogaratsu' series, which he created together with (Bosse) in 1983. Michetz held multiple Japanese-themed expositions. Michetz died on 9 January 2025, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:Belgian comics artists Category:1951 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from Brussels-Capital Region Category:Place of death missing
